Sentencas: This article is to address the bonding and sealing capability of two yttrium borosilicate glasses.
Titulo: Effect of Thermal Treatment on Chemical Interaction Between Yttrium Borosilicate Glass Sealants and YSZ for Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: These glass seals have been tested with AISI 441 steel and high-temperature solid electrolyte that is yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ), as a function of different heating durations for planar solid oxide fuel cell applications in air atmosphere.
Titulo: Effect of Thermal Treatment on Chemical Interaction Between Yttrium Borosilicate Glass Sealants and YSZ for Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The diffusion couples were prepared by slurry coating and then subjected to heat-treatment for different time durations of 1, 100, and 500h at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of Thermal Treatment on Chemical Interaction Between Yttrium Borosilicate Glass Sealants and YSZ for Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In addition to this, the diffusion couples with YSZ were also thermally cycled between room temperature and 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of Thermal Treatment on Chemical Interaction Between Yttrium Borosilicate Glass Sealants and YSZ for Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: These prepared diffusion couples have been characterized using X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscope (SEM), and energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDS).
Titulo: Effect of Thermal Treatment on Chemical Interaction Between Yttrium Borosilicate Glass Sealants and YSZ for Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: XRD indicated surface crystallization of the coating glass/YSZ diffusion couple.
Titulo: Effect of Thermal Treatment on Chemical Interaction Between Yttrium Borosilicate Glass Sealants and YSZ for Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: MgY glass sample shows less devitrification than the CaY glass.
Titulo: Effect of Thermal Treatment on Chemical Interaction Between Yttrium Borosilicate Glass Sealants and YSZ for Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The overall analysis of the resulting microstructure by SEM/EDS revealed improvement in adhesion with increase in time duration of heat treatment as well as thermally cycled sample without any detrimental phase formation.
Titulo: Effect of Thermal Treatment on Chemical Interaction Between Yttrium Borosilicate Glass Sealants and YSZ for Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The diffusion couples with AISI 441 steel have shown good adhesion with crack-free interface.
Titulo: Effect of Thermal Treatment on Chemical Interaction Between Yttrium Borosilicate Glass Sealants and YSZ for Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
